game.rules_description: Score points by getting the ball past your opponent's paddle. First to reach the winning score wins!

about.title: About

project_description.part1: ft_transcendence is a web-based real-time Pong game platform developed as part of the 42 school curriculum. This project challenges us to create a complete web application featuring user authentication, real-time gameplay, tournament systems, and social features.
project_description.part2: Our implementation features both local and AI gameplay, customizable game settings, user profiles, and a sleek, modern interface designed to provide an exceptional gaming experience.

feature_descriptions.realtime: Play the classic Pong game with modern graphics and smooth gameplay
feature_descriptions.ai: Challenge our intelligent AI with adjustable difficulty levels
feature_descriptions.profiles: Create your profile, track your stats, and view your match history
feature_descriptions.customization: Personalize your game experience with various visual options
feature_descriptions.authentication: Robust authentication system with 42 OAuth integration
feature_descriptions.responsive: Enjoy the game on various devices and screen sizes

about.team_description: ft_transcendence was developed by a dedicated team of 42 students, combining expertise in web development, game design, and user experience to create this immersive online Pong platform.

contact.title: Meet
contact.subtitle: The masterminds behind ft_transcendence
contact.intro: Our team of five developers worked together to create this immersive Pong experience. Each member brought unique skills and perspectives to make ft_transcendence a reality.

descriptions.frontend: Developed the responsive user interface and implemented interactive elements throughout the application. Created the smooth animations and visual effects that enhance the user experience.
descriptions.backend: Architected the backend infrastructure using Fastify and Node.js. Designed the database schema and implemented the API endpoints for seamless data flow between frontend and backend.
descriptions.game: Implemented the core game mechanics and physics for Pong. Developed the AI opponent with multiple difficulty levels and created the matchmaking system for tournaments.
descriptions.devops: Set up the infrastructure with Docker and Nginx. Configured SSL/TLS for secure connections and implemented authentication mechanisms throughout the application.
descriptions.fullstack: Implemented user authentication with 42 OAuth integration. Created real-time features using WebSockets and developed the user profile and friend system.

descriptions.planning: We started by breaking down the requirements and planning our architecture. This involved choosing technologies, designing database schemas, and creating wireframes.
descriptions.development: With a clear plan in place, we built the core features iteratively. Starting with the basic Pong game, we added authentication, user profiles, and multiplayer capabilities.
descriptions.polishing: After implementing the core functionality, we enhanced the UI/UX, optimized performance, and implemented additional features like AI opponents and customization options.
descriptions.deployment: Finally, we containerized the application with Docker, set up Nginx for routing, and implemented security measures for a production-ready deployment.
